# tag-card-widget

















## Demos

















Card widget

















```html








<tag-card-widget








          id="cardButton"








          value="26.5 Hours"








          description="2 timesheets submitted"








          accent="midnight-blue"








          buttontext="Test"








          applicationname="Focalpoint"








          applicationicon="CalendarTick" />








```

















<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### accent

string

The left border accent colour


#### applicationicon

string

Application icon. Either the image or icon is used, the image is used over the icon when both are used.


#### applicationimage

string

Application image. Either the image or icon is used, the image is used over the icon when both are used.


#### applicationname

string

Application name


#### buttonclick




#### buttonicon

string

Icon for the button. ```buttontext``` or ```buttonicon``` must exist for button to appear.


#### buttontext

string

Text used for the button. ```buttontext``` or ```buttonicon``` must exist for button to appear.


#### description

string

The description of the text


#### value

string

The value of text for the widget


## Attributes

#### accent

string

The left border accent colour


#### applicationicon

string

Application icon. Either the image or icon is used, the image is used over the icon when both are used.

#### buttonicon

string

Icon for the button. ```buttontext``` or ```buttonicon``` must exist for button to appear.


#### buttontext

string
